RTCIceCandidatePairStatsBytesReceived.summary: The bytesReceived property of the dictionary indicates the total number of received payload bytes that have been received so far on the connection described by the candidate pair.
RTCIceCandidatePairStatsBytesReceived.value: An integer indicating the total number of bytes received so far on the connection described by this candidate pair.Only data bytes are counted; overhead such as padding, headers, and the like are not included in this count.
